about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: PolkaDots Cinema is a creative studio founded by Mario and Gabriela. Together, we capture love stories through two complementary perspectives, blending artistic sensitivity, cinematic technique, and a genuine connection with every couple. Our work is focused on creating authentic, emotional, and timeless wedding films.
about.description: Our style is rooted in the balance between honest storytelling and a refined visual aesthetic. We observe, anticipate, and tell stories as they naturally unfold, whether in an intimate celebration or a large-scale wedding. We believe every couple has a unique way of loving, and our mission is to transform it into a film that feels real, personal, and made to last.
